survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from students about their satisfaction with campus dining services, including food quality, variety, and service efficiency.

questions.question_text: How often do you use the campus dining facilities?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice question to gauge frequency of use. Ensure options cover all possible scenarios.

script.question_text: How often do you use the campus dining facilities?

questions.question_text: Which of the following factors are most important to you when choosing a campus dining facility? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice question to identify key factors influencing dining choices.

script.question_text: Which of the following factors are most important to you when choosing a campus dining facility? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the quality of food offered at campus dining facilities?
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 answer is not 'Never'
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice Likert scale to measure satisfaction with food quality.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the quality of food offered at campus dining facilities?
script.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 answer is not 'Never'

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for campus dining services?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended question to capture detailed feedback for improvements.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for campus dining services?
